mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Subject (subId, subName, subTeacherId, subCredit, gmtCreate, gmtModify, isReal) VALUE (#{subId}, #{subName}, #{subTeacherId}, #{subCredit}, #{gmtCreate}, #{gmtModify}, #{isReal})
mapper.update: UPDATE Subject SET subName = #{subName}, subTeacherId = #{subTeacherId}, subCredit = #{subCredit}, gmtCreate = #{gmtCreate}, gmtModify = #{gmtModify}, isReal = #{isReal} WHERE subId = #{subId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM Subject WHERE subId = #{subId} AND isReal = 1
